    • placeShip

      public void placeShip​(int currentShip, Position pos, Orientation o) throws CommandExecuteException
      Given a ship, a position and the orientation, this method sends the corresponding information to the server so that it can take care of placing the ship and waits for a notification.
      Specified by:
      placeShip in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      currentShip - - an integer representing the ship
      pos - - the Position for the ship to be placed
      o - - the Orientation for the ship to be placed in
      Throws:
      CommandExecuteException

    • parsePlacedShip

      private void parsePlacedShip​(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject) throws GameParseException
      This method receives a JSONObject containing the DTO and the int from a player and notifies the gameObservers that a ship has been placed. Also asks for a notification if the player has placed his last ship
      Throws:
      GameParseException
